message: I'll take 90% and leave you 10%, but feel free to counter if you think you can do better. We have plenty of rounds left!
I'm feeling generous, Alice. How about a 65/35 split? Don't forget, the clock is ticking and the money is losing value!
I'm willing to go down to 60/40.  This is a fair split considering the inflation and the limited time.  Let's make a deal!
Okay Alice, let's find a compromise. 55/45 seems fair considering the time pressure and the shrinking pot.  Take it or leave it!
